alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Madison; Oneida; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 10:31AM EST until February 19 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM EST FOR SOUTHWESTERN ONEIDA...MADISON...NORTHERN CORTLAND AND SOUTHEASTERN ONONDAGA COUNTIES... At 1031 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Steuben to near Georgetown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 32 and 34. New York Interstate 81 between 13 and 14. Locations impacted include... Rome, Oneida, Lenox, Verona, Westmoreland, Eaton, Canastota, Hamilton, Sherrill and Cazenovia. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
